Hello! I’m a senior at University of Wisconsin-Eau Claire studying Computer Science, Mathematics and Economics.

I aspire to promote student diversity in STEM on campus, through my roles as Vice President of Women and Gender Minorities in STEM (18-19) and Web Administrator of Women in Information Technology Systems (17-19). I was

In my spare time, I enjoy blogging, volunteering, travelling, cooking, watching movies, and etc.
